fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
ENTSO-E ( European Network Transmission System Operators) 
www.entsoe.eu
goals__remit:
Swissgrid is the national grid company, and in its capacity as transmission system operator it ensures the secure, reliable and cost-effective operation of the Swiss high-voltage grid. 
 
Swissgrid employs more than 350 highly qualified people from twelve countries at its sites in Laufenburg, Frick and Vevey. 
 
 
As a member of the European Network of Transmission System Operators for Electricity (ENTSO-E), it is also responsible for coordination and grid usage in the cross-border exchange of electricity in Europe.
